General.Name: Jiangsu Lianfa Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Lianfa Textile Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the textile business in China. The company's fabric products include long staple length cotton, texture, natural, and functional finishing fabrics; and garment products comprise formal and casual shirts for men and formal shirts and casual wear for women. It also offers cotton and compact yarns which are suitable for woven fabrics and yarn-dyed yarns. In addition, the company is involved in yarn spinning, dyeing, weaving, finishing, and printing activities. Further, it engages in the thermal power generation. The company exports its products to 36 countries, including Japan, the United States, Europe, and South East Asia. Jiangsu Lianfa Textile Co.,Ltd was founded in 1955 and is headquartered in Nantong, China.

3.Name: Mr. Pan Zhi  Gang
3.Title: Exec. Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
